*** Settings ***
Resource          ../../UserKeywords/UserKeywords_Database.txt

*** Variables ***
${dsn}            dsn='Nettzza'    # You should setup dsn and account information and configuration in ODBC.
${selectscript}    SELECT PERFORMANCEID , EFFECTIVEDATE , TABLENAME , RECORDACTION , RECORDLOGDATE , FILENAME \ FROM MSNZDEV.ABACHU.ADT_PERFORMANCE LIMIT 10;
${DATABASE_IP}    DP-DB-PROD
${DATABASE_USER}    DMClient
${DATABASE_PASSWORD}    h(4Xo(T5rbB0
${QueryScript}    SELECT A.InvestmentId, A.InvestmentType, B.DocumentId, B.DocumentType, B.LanguageId, B.DocumentEffectiveDate, C.Identifier FROM FilingInvestmentLink A LEFT JOIN Filing B ON A.DocumentId = B.DocumentId LEFT JOIN GlobalInvestmentIdentifier C ON A.InvestmentId = C.InvestmentId WHERE [Status] <> 3 AND InternalOnly <> 1 AND A.InvestmentId = 'F00000VBK0' ORDER BY B.DocumentEffectiveDate DESC, B.DocumentId DESC
${DATABASE_Name}    DoclibData
${DATABASE_PORT}    1433

*** Test Cases ***
Database_Test_ODBC_Nettzza
    @{queryresultset}=    KW_Database_ODBC_Select1    ${dsn}    ${selectscript}
    Log Many    @{queryresultset}

Database_Test_SQLServer_SelectDataSet
